findings.title: A01.Declaration shadows an existing declaration
findings.description: Shadowed declarations could make a code not obvious and may lead to inconsistencies.

findings.title: A02.Interface function virtual declaration
findings.description: Remove the keyword 'virtual' from interface function declarations.

findings.title: The owner can withdraw all rewards (wom) from the MasterWombat contract
findings.description: The owner has the capability to withdraw all rewards (wom) from the MasterWombat contract, which may lead to unintended consequences.
